MAN.TITLE: det

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: : real or complex square matrix, polynomial or rational matrix.
: real or complex number, the determinant base 10 mantissae

DESCRIPTION.P: det(X) ( m*10^e is the determinant of the square matrix X.
For polynomial matrix det(X) is equivalent to determ(X).
For rational matrices det(X) is equivalent to detr(X).

ITEMIZE.label: REFERENCES
ITEMIZE.P: det computations are based on the Lapack routines DGETRF for real matrices and ZGETRF for the complex case.
